overview: Kami, an androgynous teenager, is persecuted and humiliated on the internet. With a camera in hand, he records the odd day of his birthday. Inspired by the real facts of teenagers who committed suicide for not feeling loved as they are, the short film dialogues in a contemporary way on topics such as homophobia, virtual bullying, transsexuality, and gender vs. sexual orientation.
title: Popkamikaze
